episode.title: Cariboo Signals - Working Lands & Industry
episode.description:
Riley and Casey explore technology and society in rural communities. Today's focus: Working Lands & Industry.

NEWS ROUNDUP: We break down [CFJC Today Kamloops] CFJC Midday – Recycle it Right! City of Kamloops encourages residents to attend Family Day Festival and take part in fun and educating activities and [CFJC Today Kamloops] Kamloops DPAC extends safety push to limit vehicle traffic near schools, plus 1 more stories, and explore what these developments mean for communities like ours.

RURAL CONNECTIONS: Deep dive into working lands & industry, discussing how rural and remote communities can thoughtfully adopt and adapt emerging technologies.

Hosts: Riley (Tech systems thinker with rural roots) and Casey (Community development focus).
